heading: HR01079
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE NATIONAL TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION AND RELEVANT AGENCIES TO CONDUCT EARNEST INVESTIGATION GERMANE TO ALLEGED UNPAID CARRIAGE FEES OF SKY CABLE PAYABLE TO SOLAR ENTERTAINMENT, AS WELL AS, DEVISING A SCHEME TO FACILITATE THE RECOMPENSE OF AFFECTED SUBSCRIBERS
